title: SHOCK DISCOVERY: Who hurled infant girl down rocky ravine to die as coyotes prowled?
itunes:title: SHOCK DISCOVERY: Who hurled infant girl down rocky ravine to die as coyotes prowled?
description:
A North Carolina mother calls 911 and claims her 7-month-old baby has been kidnapped. Hours later, the baby is found down a 75-foot ravine. The mother is nowhere to be found.

Cheryl and Scott Fowler tell Nancy the unbelievable story of finding baby Shaylie in the woods behind their home.

Nancy's expert panel weighs in:

Stefany Bornman: Reporter for WSPA-TV

Troy Slaten: Los Angeles defense lawyer

Steven Lampley: Former detective

Dr. Bethany Marshall: Psychoanalyst and family therapist

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
